Ghost Ship.name: Ghost Ship
Ghost Ship.rules_text:
Voidwalk

Whenever Ghost Ship enters a site from the void, you may summon a Spirit from any cemetery to its location.

Giant Shark.name: Giant Shark
Giant Shark.rules_text:
Submerge, Waterbound

Whenever another unit enters or moves between sites in this body of water, Giant Shark moves to that unit to fight it.

Great Old One.name: Great Old One
Great Old One.rules_text:
Submerge

Genesis → Permanently flood the entire realm, including voids.

Guile Sirens.name: Guile Sirens
Guile Sirens.rules_text:
Submerge

At the start of your turn, force target nearby enemy minion to take a step toward Guile Sirens.

Lord of Unland.name: Lord of Unland
Lord of Unland.rules_text:
Submerge 

Other allies occupying Lord of Unland's body of water have +1 power.

Megamoeba.name: Megamoeba
Megamoeba.rules_text: Megamoeba moves by extending a single pseudopod from any part of itself. It occupies all locations it has ever occupied, and has +1 power for each.

Mother Nature.name: Mother Nature
Mother Nature.rules_text: At the start of your turn, reveal your topmost spell. If it's a minion, you may summon it here.

Old Salt Anchorman.name: Old Salt Anchorman
Old Salt Anchorman.rules_text: Nearby allies can't be moved by enemy spells and abilities.

Ormund Harpooneers.name: Ormund Harpooneers
Ormund Harpooneers.rules_text: Tap → Deal 1 damage to target minion above or below an adjacent water site and pull that minion to this location.

Polar Bears.name: Polar Bears
Polar Bears.rules_text: Can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected.

Polar Explorers.name: Polar Explorers
Polar Explorers.rules_text: Allied units here can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected.

Ruler of Thul.name: Ruler of Thul
Ruler of Thul.rules_text:
Charge 

Allies can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected. Other allies occupying sites there have +1 power.

Sea Raider.name: Sea Raider
Sea Raider.rules_text: Whenever Sea Raider attacks and kills an enemy, its controller discards their topmost spell. You may cast that spell once this turn, ignoring threshold.

Seirawan Hydra.name: Seirawan Hydra
Seirawan Hydra.rules_text: UPDATED: Immediately heals from damage that doesn't kill it.

Selfsame Simulacrum.name: Selfsame Simulacrum
Selfsame Simulacrum.rules_text: May be summoned as a basic copy of a nearby minion.

Sneak Thief.name: Sneak Thief
Sneak Thief.rules_text:
Stealth

Tap → Steal an artifact out of the hands of another target unit here, and stay Stealthed.

Tide Naiads.name: Tide Naiads
Tide Naiads.rules_text:
Submerge

This site is flooded. It is a water site.

Tringh Constrictor.name: Tringh Constrictor
Tringh Constrictor.rules_text: Tap → Tringh Constrictor may take a step, then it constricts and disables target minion at its location. At the start of your next turn, if the minion remains constricted, it dies. Tringh Constrictor doesn't untap during your next untap step.

Tufted Turtles.name: Tufted Turtles
Tufted Turtles.rules_text: The first time Tuft Turtles would take damage each turn, prevent that damage.

Unland Angler.name: Unland Angler
Unland Angler.rules_text:
Submerge

At the start of your turn, if Unland Angler is submerged, force each enemy minion atop adjacent sites to take a step toward this one.

Unland Eel.name: Unland Eel
Unland Eel.rules_text:
Submerge

Whenever Unland Eel submerges, it may drag another minion down with it.

Yokai Kappas.name: Yokai Kappas
Yokai Kappas.rules_text: Discard a water site → Untap Yokai Kappas. Use only once per turn.

Dodge Roll.name: Dodge Roll
Dodge Roll.rules_text:
May be cast when an ally is attacked.
An attacked ally may move to another adjacent location to evade the attack.

Drown.name: Drown
Drown.rules_text: Submerge target minion or artifact, if able.

Extinguish.name: Extinguish
Extinguish.rules_text: Banish all fire minions and fire auras occupying target site up to two steps away.

Fire Harpoons!.name: Fire Harpoons!
Fire Harpoons!.rules_text: Deal 1 damage to target minion above or below an adjacent Water site and pull it to the caster's location. Draw a card.

Font of Life.name: Font of Life
Font of Life.rules_text: Each ally heals an amount equal to the number of sites in its body of water.

Frost Nova.name: Frost Nova
Frost Nova.rules_text: Freeze nearby enemy minions. They're disabled until your next turn.

Geyser.name: Geyser
Geyser.rules_text: This turn, flood target site and give each minion there Airborne. Draw a card.

Ice Lance.name: Ice Lance
Ice Lance.rules_text: UPDATED: Shoot a piercing projectile. Deal 3, then 2, then 1 damage to up to one hit unit at each of the first three locations along its path.

Marine Voyage.name: Marine Voyage
Marine Voyage.rules_text: This turn, your units can move between any sites in a chosen body of water as if they were adjacent.

Pollimorph.name: Pollimorph
Pollimorph.rules_text: Transform target nearby minion into a Frog token.

Replication.name: Replication
Replication.rules_text: Conjure a copy of an artifact carried by the caster.

Riptide.name: Riptide
Riptide.rules_text: Target water site pulls in an aboveground unit it's adjacent to. Draw a card.

Shrink.name: Shrink
Shrink.rules_text: Set the base power of target nearby unit to 0 until your next turn.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.rules_text: Target minion at a location up to two steps away falls asleep. It's disabled until it takes damage.

Stormy Seas.name: Stormy Seas
Stormy Seas.rules_text: Submerge all minions and artifacts occupying target water site.

Twist of Fate.name: Twist of Fate
Twist of Fate.rules_text: Exchange life totals with target opponent. (X) is the difference between your life totals.

Upwelling.name: Upwelling
Upwelling.rules_text: Target a nearby site. Return each artifact and minion there to its owner's hand.

Wrath of the Sea.name: Wrath of the Sea
Wrath of the Sea.rules_text: Flood all sites adjacent to a body of water this turn. Then submerge all minions and artifacts on water.

Abundance.name: Abundance
Abundance.rules_text: Each affected site provides one additional mana.

Atlantean Fate.name: Atlantean Fate
Atlantean Fate.rules_text:
Affected non-Ordinary sites are flooded. They are water sites, only provide Water threshold, and lose all other abilities.
Genesis → Submerge all minions and artifacts atop affected sites.

Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.rules_text:
Affected sites and units atop them can't be attacked or intercepted. 

At the start of your turn, dispel Blizzard.

Flood.name: Flood
Flood.rules_text: Affected sites are flooded. They're water sites.

Mariner's Curse.name: Mariner's Curse
Mariner's Curse.rules_text: Whenever a minion enters an affected water site, submerge it and return Mariner's Curse to its owner's hand.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.rules_text: UPDATED: Minions occupying affected sites are silenced.

Wall of Ice.name: Wall of Ice
Wall of Ice.rules_text:
Conjure atop the border of a site you control.

Units can't traverse Wall of Ice on the ground.

All-terrain Vestments.name: All-terrain Vestments
All-terrain Vestments.rules_text: Bearer has Burrowing, Submerge, and Voidwalk, if it's a minion.

Amethyst Core.name: Amethyst Core
Amethyst Core.rules_text: Provides (A) and ① to its controller.

Angel's Egg.name: Angel's Egg
Angel's Egg.rules_text: At the end of each turn, the controller of Angel's Egg's site heals 1 life.

Aquamarine Core.name: Aquamarine Core
Aquamarine Core.rules_text: Provides (W) and ① to its controller.

Battering Ram.name: Battering Ram
Battering Ram.rules_text: Units here have “Tap → Destroy target adjacent Wall or Monument.”

Belfry.name: Belfry
Belfry.rules_text: At the end of your turn, untap all nearby allies.

Black Obelisk.name: Black Obelisk
Black Obelisk.rules_text: Black Obelisk's site has “At the start of your turn, lose 2 life and gain ② this turn.”

Blasted Oak.name: Blasted Oak
Blasted Oak.rules_text: If a spell or non-basic ability can target—in order of precedence—Blasted Oak, its site or location, or anything else at its site or location, it must.

Buried Treasure.name: Buried Treasure
Buried Treasure.rules_text:
If cast, conjure this under an allied land site of an opponent's choice.

When Buried Treasure is carried to the surface, its controller sacrifices it and draws two cards.

Chains of Prometheus.name: Chains of Prometheus
Chains of Prometheus.rules_text: Whenever a player draws a card, that player taps their strongest untapped minion.

Crave Golem.name: Crave Golem
Crave Golem.rules_text: At the start of each player's turn, Crave Golem attacks a random minion within its range of motion, or takes a step toward the closest minion if it can't.

Crown of the Victor.name: Crown of the Victor
Crown of the Victor.rules_text: Bearer has +3 power if they've ever killed a minion.

Devil's Egg.name: Devil's Egg
Devil's Egg.rules_text: At the end of each turn, the controller of Devil's Egg's site loses 1 life.

Doomsday Device.name: Doomsday Device
Doomsday Device.rules_text:
Doomsday Device enters the realm with 6 counters. At the end of each player’s turn, remove a counter. When the last is removed, it detonates!

Deals damage to each unit at affected locations:

Drums of Doom.name: Drums of Doom
Drums of Doom.rules_text: Damage dealt to minions nearby is lethal.

Erik's Curiosa.name: Erik's Curiosa
Erik's Curiosa.rules_text: Rip Erik's Curiosa to pieces → Draw a card from your collection.

Flaming Sword.name: Flaming Sword
Flaming Sword.rules_text: Bearer has +1 power, and its strikes splash full damage to each other enemy at a struck unit's location.

Gilded Aegis.name: Gilded Aegis
Gilded Aegis.rules_text: If bearer is a minion and would die, instead fully heal it and banish Gilded Aegis.

Iron Shackles.name: Iron Shackles
Iron Shackles.rules_text:
May be conjured to target enemy minion.

Bearer is disabled.

Kythera Mechanism.name: Kythera Mechanism
Kythera Mechanism.rules_text: Bearer's controller determines all random outcomes.

Lucky Charm.name: Lucky Charm
Lucky Charm.rules_text: Bearer's controller has “Whenever you do something at random, you may do it an extra time and choose one of the outcomes.”

Maddening Bells.name: Maddening Bells
Maddening Bells.rules_text: Spells cast by a nearby Spellcaster cost ② more to cast.

Magellan Globe.name: Magellan Globe
Magellan Globe.rules_text: Opposite edges of the realm are connected.

Magnetic Muzzle.name: Magnetic Muzzle
Magnetic Muzzle.rules_text:
UPDATED: Bearer is silenced and can't drop Magnetic Muzzle.

At the end of each player’s turn, if Magnetic Muzzle is abandoned, that player attaches it to a nearby minion.

Mask of Mayhem.name: Mask of Mayhem
Mask of Mayhem.rules_text:
UPDATED: Whenever a nearby minion can attack, it must.

Nearby strikes against units deal double damage.

Mix Aer.name: Mix Aer
Mix Aer.rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Aer → This turn, bearer's next Air spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

Mix Aqua.name: Mix Aqua
Mix Aqua.rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Aqua → This turn, bearer's next Water spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

Mix Ignis.name: Mix Ignis
Mix Ignis.rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Ignis → This turn, bearer's next Fire spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

Mix Terra.name: Mix Terra
Mix Terra.rules_text: Sacrifice Mix Terra → This turn, bearer's next Earth spell requires no threshold and costs ③ less to cast.

Onyx Core.name: Onyx Core
Onyx Core.rules_text: Provides (E) and ① to its controller.

Orb of Ba'al Berith.name: Orb of Ba'al Berith
Orb of Ba'al Berith.rules_text: The first time each turn a Magic spell is cast nearby, Orb of Ba'al Berith creates a copy. The spell's controller may choose new targets.

Payload Trebuchet.name: Payload Trebuchet
Payload Trebuchet.rules_text: Tap bearer and another ally here, Discard a card → Deal damage equal to the discarded card's mana cost to each unit at target location up to three steps away.

Pendulum of Peril.name: Pendulum of Peril
Pendulum of Peril.rules_text: At the end of each player's turn, Pendulum of Peril kills all minions at its current location and another adjacent location of that player's choice.

Philosopher's Stone.name: Philosopher's Stone
Philosopher's Stone.rules_text: The first spell of each element cast by the bearer each turn costs ① less.

Pnakotic Manuscript.name: Pnakotic Manuscript
Pnakotic Manuscript.rules_text: Bearer has “Tap → Reveal your topmost spell and draw it. Bearer takes damage equal to that card's cost.”

Purge Juggernaut.name: Purge Juggernaut
Purge Juggernaut.rules_text: UPDATED: At the start of your turn, Purge Juggernaut taps and moves to an adjacent location. Kill all other minions there.

Rolling Boulder.name: Rolling Boulder
Rolling Boulder.rules_text: Units here have “Tap → Give Rolling Boulder a push. It rolls as far as possible and deals 4 damage to each other unit along its path.”

Ruby Core.name: Ruby Core
Ruby Core.rules_text: Provides (F) and ① to its controller.

Scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
Scarecrow.rules_text:
Genesis → Return each Airborne minion here to its owner’s hand.
 
Airborne minions can't enter this location.

Screaming Skull.name: Screaming Skull
Screaming Skull.rules_text: Whenever bearer attacks and kills an enemy, it untaps.

Siege Ballista.name: Siege Ballista
Siege Ballista.rules_text: Tap bearer and another ally here → Deal 3 damage to target unit up to two steps away.

Spear of Destiny.name: Spear of Destiny
Spear of Destiny.rules_text: Bearer has “Tap → Throw Spear of Destiny at any minion anywhere. It teleports to that minion’s location and kills it.”

Sunken Treasure.name: Sunken Treasure
Sunken Treasure.rules_text:
If cast, conjure this under an allied water site of an opponent's choice.

When Sunken Treasure is carried to the surface, its controller sacrifices it and draws two cards.

The Immortal Throne.name: The Immortal Throne
The Immortal Throne.rules_text:
Whenever anyone plays a card with cost equal to the number of level counters on The Immortal Throne, they draw a card and add a level counter.

At level 8 or more, an Avatar here alone wins the game.

Torshammar Trinket.name: Torshammar Trinket
Torshammar Trinket.rules_text: UPDATED: Bearer has +1 power. After each turn, return this to its owner’s hand.

Truesight Crossbow.name: Truesight Crossbow
Truesight Crossbow.rules_text: UPDATED: Bearer has Ranged and can see stealthed enemies.

Undertaker Engine.name: Undertaker Engine
Undertaker Engine.rules_text: At the end of your turn, you may burrow and/or unburrow any combination of artifacts and minions at this site.

Wings of Invention.name: Wings of Invention
Wings of Invention.rules_text: Bearer has Airborne and Movement +1, if it's a minion.

Cloud City.name: Cloud City
Cloud City.rules_text: (A)(A)(A) — Once on your turn, this site may fly to a nearby void.

Dark Tower.name: Dark Tower
Dark Tower.rules_text: Genesis → If this is the only Dark Tower you control, gain ① this turn.

Gothic Tower.name: Gothic Tower
Gothic Tower.rules_text: Genesis → If this is the only Gothic Tower you control, gain ① this turn.

Lone Tower.name: Lone Tower
Lone Tower.rules_text: Genesis → If this is the only Lone Tower you control, gain ① this turn.

Mountain Pass.name: Mountain Pass
Mountain Pass.rules_text: Minions can't enter this site on the ground if there's already a minion atop.

Observatory.name: Observatory
Observatory.rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next three spells. Put them back in any order.

Updraft Ridge.name: Updraft Ridge
Updraft Ridge.rules_text: UPDATED: Airborne minions atop Updraft Ridge move freely away.

Watchtower.name: Watchtower
Watchtower.rules_text: Enemy units atop nearby sites permanently lose Stealth.

Bedrock.name: Bedrock
Bedrock.rules_text: Can't be moved, destroyed, or modified.

Gnome Hollows.name: Gnome Hollows
Gnome Hollows.rules_text: Units with 3 or more power can’t enter this site.

Holy Ground.name: Holy Ground
Holy Ground.rules_text: Genesis → Each nearby Avatar heals 3 life.

Humble Village.name: Humble Village
Humble Village.rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

Pillar of Zeiros.name: Pillar of Zeiros
Pillar of Zeiros.rules_text: Genesis → Banish all dead minions, and you heal 1 life for each.

Quagmire.name: Quagmire
Quagmire.rules_text: Genesis → Units occupying nearby sites are Immobile until your next turn.

Rift Valley.name: Rift Valley
Rift Valley.rules_text: You may pull apart a partial row or column to make a void in which to play this.

Rustic Village.name: Rustic Village
Rustic Village.rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

Secret Tunnel.name: Secret Tunnel
Secret Tunnel.rules_text: Burrowed allies can move as if this were adjacent to your other sites.

Simple Village.name: Simple Village
Simple Village.rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

Vantage Hills.name: Vantage Hills
Vantage Hills.rules_text: Ranged units atop this site have +1 range.

Arid Desert.name: Arid Desert
Arid Desert.rules_text: Genesis → Deal 1 damage to each minion atop target nearby site.

Dwarven Forge.name: Dwarven Forge
Dwarven Forge.rules_text: Anyone may conjure Weapons and Armor here, and for ① less.

Mirage.name: Mirage
Mirage.rules_text: When played, you may return a site in play you own to your hand to play this site in its place.

Red Desert.name: Red Desert
Red Desert.rules_text: Genesis → Deal 1 damage to each minion atop target nearby site.

Remote Desert.name: Remote Desert
Remote Desert.rules_text: Genesis → Deal 1 damage to each minion atop target nearby site.

Shifting Sands.name: Shifting Sands
Shifting Sands.rules_text: Genesis → Reactivate the Genesis abilities of your nearby Deserts.

Smokestacks of Gnaak.name: Smokestacks of Gnaak
Smokestacks of Gnaak.rules_text: Other nearby sites lose their abilities.

Vesuvius.name: Vesuvius
Vesuvius.rules_text: (F)(F)(F) — Sacrifice Vesuvius → Each unit occupying nearby sites takes 3 damage.

Autumn River.name: Autumn River
Autumn River.rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

Floodplain.name: Floodplain
Floodplain.rules_text: Once on your turn, you may flood an adjacent site this turn.

Iceberg.name: Iceberg
Iceberg.rules_text: Minions occupying nearby sites can't submerge or surface.

Island Leviathan.name: Island Leviathan
Island Leviathan.rules_text: (W)(W)(W)(W)(W)(W)(W)(W) — Transform into a Monster. Place flooded Rubble underneath.

Maelstr\u00f6m.name: Maelström
Maelstr\u00f6m.rules_text: At the start of your turn, you may pull in each minion in this body of water one step.

Spring River.name: Spring River
Spring River.rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

Summer River.name: Summer River
Summer River.rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

Tadpole Pool.name: Tadpole Pool
Tadpole Pool.rules_text: (W)(W)(W) — Genesis → Summon three submerged Frog tokens here.

Undertow.name: Undertow
Undertow.rules_text: Genesis → Staying within this body of water, move target unit one step.

Pristine Paradise.name: Pristine Paradise
Pristine Paradise.rules_text: Provides no mana or threshold unless completely empty.

The Colour Out of Space.name: The Colour Out of Space
The Colour Out of Space.rules_text: Provides no mana or threshold if not adjacent to the void.

Astral Alcazar.name: Astral Alcazar
Astral Alcazar.rules_text: Units can move between this site and any void as if they were adjacent.

Battlefield.name: Battlefield
Battlefield.rules_text: Genesis → Conjure a broken Weapon or Armor here.

Boneyard.name: Boneyard
Boneyard.rules_text: Genesis → Each player may summon a minion from their cemetery here.

Bottomless Pit.name: Bottomless Pit
Bottomless Pit.rules_text: Whenever a non-Airborne minion enters this site, kill it.

Cornerstone.name: Cornerstone
Cornerstone.rules_text: You may play this site to one of your corners.

Crossroads.name: Crossroads
Crossroads.rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next four sites. Put three on the bottom of your atlas.

Dome of Osiros.name: Dome of Osiros
Dome of Osiros.rules_text: This site and minions here can't be attacked.

Donnybrook Inn.name: Donnybrook Inn
Donnybrook Inn.rules_text: Anyone may cast minions here and they may do so for ① less.

Edge of the World.name: Edge of the World
Edge of the World.rules_text: Must always be adjacent to the void.

Free City.name: Free City
Free City.rules_text: Once per turn, may attack or defend against enemy units here.

Great Wall.name: Great Wall
Great Wall.rules_text: Enemy ground minions can’t move through this site’s top border.

Imperial Road.name: Imperial Road
Imperial Road.rules_text: Genesis → Target opponent, then you, may play a site adjacent to this one.

Mirror Realm.name: Mirror Realm
Mirror Realm.rules_text: This site enters the realm as a copy of another nearby site.

Mudflow.name: Mudflow
Mudflow.rules_text: At the start of your turn, surface or unburrow each minion occupying target site nearby.

Planar Gate.name: Planar Gate
Planar Gate.rules_text: Minions here can traverse the void, gaining Voidwalk until leaving it.

Primordial Spring.name: Primordial Spring
Primordial Spring.rules_text: Genesis → If you control fewer sites than any opponent, draw three sites.

Roots of Yggdrasil.name: Roots of Yggdrasil
Roots of Yggdrasil.rules_text: When the Roots of Yggdrasil are destroyed, destroy everything.

Sinkhole.name: Sinkhole
Sinkhole.rules_text: Sacrifice Sinkhole → Destroy a nearby site.

The Geistwood.name: The Geistwood
The Geistwood.rules_text: Genesis abilities here are also Deathrite abilities.

Vaults of Zul.name: Vaults of Zul
Vaults of Zul.rules_text: The first time an Avatar stops here, they draw three cards and skip their next turn.

Avatar of Air.name: Avatar of Air
Avatar of Air.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Once on your turn, if you occupy an Air site, you may fly a unit atop it to a nearby site.

Avatar of Earth.name: Avatar of Earth
Avatar of Earth.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

You have +1 power for each nearby earth site.

Avatar of Fire.name: Avatar of Fire
Avatar of Fire.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Tap → This turn, fire sites in your hand are also Fireballs.

Avatar of Water.name: Avatar of Water
Avatar of Water.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Tap → Flood a site adjacent to your body of water until you do so again. You may teleport there.

Battlemage.name: Battlemage
Battlemage.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Whenever Battlemage attacks and kills an enemy, you may draw a spell.

Deathspeaker.name: Deathspeaker
Deathspeaker.rules_text:
UPDATED: Tap → Play or draw a site.

You may banish a dead minion each turn to cast a copy of it, and for (0) if you’re on Death’s Door. The copy enters the realm, uses its Genesis, then is banished.

Elementalist.name: Elementalist
Elementalist.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

You have an additional (E)(F)(W)(A).

Enchantress.name: Enchantress
Enchantress.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Whenever you cast a spell, you may animate target aura until your next turn. It’s an aura minion with power equal to its cost.

Pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
Pathfinder.rules_text:
Your atlas can’t contain duplicates. Draw no sites during setup.

Tap → If able, play the topmost site of your atlas to an adjacent location and move there.

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

At the start of your turn, look at your topmost site or spell. You may put it on the bottom of its deck.

Sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
Sorcerer.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Tap → Draw a spell.

Relentless Crowd.name: Relentless Crowd
Relentless Crowd.rules_text:
Your spellbook may include any number of Relentless Crowds.

Has +1 power for each other Relentless Crowd nearby.

Winter River.name: Winter River
Winter River.rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

Sparkmage.name: Sparkmage
Sparkmage.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Tap → Target nearby location. Deal damage to another random unit there equal to the sum of (A) on spells you've cast this turn.

Geomancer.name: Geomancer
Geomancer.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site. If you played an earth site, fill a void adjacent to you with Rubble.

Tap → Replace an adjacent Rubble with the topmost site of your atlas.

Flamecaller.name: Flamecaller
Flamecaller.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Tap, Banish all your dead fire minions → Shoot a projectile. It deals damage equal to to the sum of their (F).

Waveshaper.name: Waveshaper
Waveshaper.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Tap → Flood a site near your body of water until you do so again. Tap minions without submerge there. They don't untap the next time they would.

Spellslinger.name: Spellslinger
Spellslinger.rules_text:
Start the game with 4 spells in hand.

Tap → Play or draw a site.

Spire.name: Spire
Spire.rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Spires.

Stream.name: Stream
Stream.rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Streams.

Valley.name: Valley
Valley.rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Valleys.

Wasteland.name: Wasteland
Wasteland.rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Wastelands.

13 Treasures of Britain.name: 13 Treasures of Britain
13 Treasures of Britain.rules_text: When picked up, bearer's controller draws a card. Teleport the Treasures to the top of a random site or void.

A Midsummer Night's Dream.name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
A Midsummer Night's Dream.rules_text: Mortals here are disabled and each give +1 power to all Faeries here. Dispel if there are no Faeries here.

Amulet of Niniane.name: Amulet of Niniane
Amulet of Niniane.rules_text: Bearer can't be targeted or damaged by magic.

Arcane Barrage.name: Arcane Barrage
Arcane Barrage.rules_text: Shoot X projectiles in the same direction, one at a time. Each deals 1 damage.

Archimago.name: Archimago
Archimago.rules_text:
Tap → Play or draw a site.

Banish three magic spells in your cemetery → Cast a copy of one of them.

Arc Lightning.name: Arc Lightning
Arc Lightning.rules_text: Deal 4 damage to target nearby unit.
